name: Make It Dark: Brain Teaser
description:
In these game we have to Blast the bulb with the ball and make it dark.

Make It Dark : Brain Puzzle Game is a level based game.

How to Play - 
- We have to launch the ball and blast the bulb.
- We have to press the launch button to launch the ball
- And the ball speed is continuously and we have to launch it according to the  situation
- There are many difficulties in between the ball in bulb like Physics based puzzle, brain riddles, logical levels and many more
- There are many Science fiction based object also in the game like BLACK HOLE, WORM HOLE etc.
- In Physics gravity play most important part in the game
- There are many Brain based puzzles like the bulb Color Keep Switching and we have to launch the ball when color of bulb and ball color matched.
- There is a chapter based on Switch the color of ball and the environment keep changing and these is also brain puzzles.
- Physics level are so much fun to play.

There are Four chapters in the game
- All Four Chapter our brain have to think differently
- So Make It Dark : Brain Puzzle Game is very good brain booster game
- And all four chapters have different puzzle based levels
